title: Staring at the Sun - An Almost Love Story
description: Eighteen year old Sarah Jenkins is about to start the most exciting journey of her life. She has gone off to college leaving behind her old boring self and long time 'sometimes' boyfriend. Determined to never get her heart broken again, she has a hard time dealing with the attention she garners from the new boys in her life. No matter how hard she tries, one boy lingers in her mind far more than any of the others- Thomas Pruitt. Unfortunately, he is the one man she can never really have.Anyone who has ever fallen in a love that can't last will relate to this honest, bittersweet tale of love, heartbreak and self discovery. Descriptively written in the first person, the reader can't help but feel the roller coaster of emotions Sarah experiences and remember their own 'Almost Loves'. This debut novel by southern writer Hadley Caulfield is bound to become one of your favorites.
author: Hadley Caulfield
